abstract: The survey company appointed Zander Lurie as its new chief executive, replacing Bill Veghte after just six months in the job. Mr. Veghte took over after the longtime chief David Goldberg died last May on a vacation to Mexico.

headline.main: SurveyMonkey Names New Chief, Its Second in Six Months

snippet: The survey company appointed Zander Lurie as its new chief executive, replacing Bill Veghte after just six months in the job. Mr. Veghte took over after the longtime chief David Goldberg died last May on a vacation to Mexico.
